column2: Full time workers weekly income by percentiles and their difference
Income is disaggregated by percentiles and the difference between the 10th and 90th percentile is calculated and displayed separately for both sexes.
Annual estimates of paid hours worked and earnings for UK employees by sex is the description of the overall dataset.

The value of the 10th percentile is subtracted from the 90th percentile to calculate the difference between the 10th and 90th percentile. Where either of these values are missing, this diferrence is not calculated.
Full time worker weekly income percentiles
